pageContext.claim: “Let me tell you, the Paris Accord is not working out too well for Paris. Take a look at what's happened over there. Because of the Paris Accord, that whole country is burning down, okay?”
pageContext.analysis: The riots in Paris were associated with higher diesel prices in part because of tax intended to promote cleaner cars and fuel. But Trump goes too far to pin it all on the Paris Accord intended to stem climate change. The protests have more to do with French President Emmanuel Macron’s elitism and perceived disdain for the working class.
